The '''Dendro Archon''' is the [[Archon]] who presides over [[Sumeru]], the land of [[Dendro]]. At least two holders of this title are known:
#The previous Dendro Archon, Greater Lord Rukkhadevata<ref>YouTube: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JrC7DTUsii8 Genshin Impact - Sumeru Preview Teaser 03]</ref> (possibly the [[God of the Woods]]), who died during the [[cataclysm]] 500 years ago.
#[[Lesser Lord Kusanali]], the current Dendro Archon.
